name: EXTRADE
description:
Made in 24 hours, half a year ago, during the 24th gm(48) gamemaker jam. Decided to upload it to itch as well.

You are falling down a building with only one bullet. Your goal is to kill your target outside one of the windows. Evade obstacles and make that sweet, slow-motion shot.

CONTROLS:

ARROW KEYS to MOVE
SPACE to SHOOT
